entry.title: Vite report on Thu, 18 Jan 2024 08:03:21
entry.summary: During the period from December 23, 2023, to January 12, 2024, several significant events unfolded around the world. In the realm of cryptocurrency, there were regulatory updates and news. Meanwhile, Ukrainian President Zelenskyy addressed skeptics of sending more US aid to Ukraine, emphasizing the importance of such assistance. In another development, cities sought increased authority from the Supreme Court to clear homeless encampments, highlighting the ongoing issue of homelessness. Additionally, technology giant Epic announced its plans to contest Apple's alleged 'bad-faith' compliance with a ruling regarding the App Store. Lastly, an intriguing invention emerged, as a new device was introduced that allows users to scroll using their tongues, humorously referred to as a "mouse for your mouth." These events collectively reflect the diverse and dynamic nature of the world during this period.
